1000101011111101 0010111101110010 1 -> sum: 1011101001110000, cout: 0
0000011111101000 0001011100110001 1 -> sum: 0001111100011010, cout: 0

0010011100110101 1000111010001001 1 -> sum: 1011010110111111, cout: 0

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
